paper_name: Identification and Optimization of Novel Small c-Abl Kinase Activators Using Fragment and HTS Methodologies

pockets.description: Allosteric inhibitors of c-Abl kinase, also active against BCR-Abl, bind at the myristoyl pocket, stabilizing interaction with helix αI′ and mimicking the autoinhibited conformation of c-Abl. Concurrently, our group have previously described the discovery of a small molecule activator of c-Abl kinase, which binds at the same pocket, displacing the myristoyl latch and leading to a cellular activation
